net.sf.jclal.evaluation.method

Class AbstractEvaluationMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.evaluation.method.AbstractEvaluationMethod
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IConfigure, IEvaluationMethod, ISystem, JCLAL, IRandGenFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HoldOut, kFoldCrossValidation

    public abstract class AbstractEvaluationMethod
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEvaluationMethod, IConfigure, ISystem
    Abstract class for evaluation methods.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • configure

        public void configure(org.apache.commons.configuration.Configuration configuration)
        Description copied from interface: IConfigure
        Configuration method.
        Specified by:
        configure in interface IConfigure
        Parameters:
        configuration - The configuration object for Abstract Evaluation Method. The XML labels supported are:
        • rand-gen-factory type= class

          Package: net.sf.jclal.util.random

          Class: All

        • sampling-method type= class

          Package: net.sf.jclal.sampling

          Class: All

        • multi-label= boolean
        • file-dataset= String
        • file-train= String
        • file-test= String
        • file-labeled= String
        • file-unlabeled= String
        • class-attribute= int
        • algorithm type= class

          Package: net.sf.jclal.activelearning

          Class: All

        • file-xml= String: If the dataset is multi label
